Find only archive files
Colorize console output*
Set output mode to debug
Set the encoding to use with text files (default: "utf-8")

Capture only the first file+pattern match

Include hidden files and directories

Specify pattern to find the "lines-after" lines on
Specify pattern to find the "lines-before" lines on
Number of lines to include after every matched line (default: 0)
Specify pattern to collect lines after up to where pattern matched
Specify pattern to collect lines after until pattern matched
Number of lines to include before every matched line (default: 0)
Generate a list of the matching directories after finding
Generate a list of the matching files after finding
Generate a list of the matching lines after finding

Do not colorize console output
Suppress printing of find results to stdout
Do not find recursively (no subdirectories)

Specify name pattern for archive files to exclude from find
Specify name pattern for directories to exclude from find

Specify name pattern for files to exclude from find

Specify pattern to filter the "lines-before" lines on
